title: What are the advantages and disadvantages of Shawn Mendes and Charlie Puth (in songs)? Which artist do you like better? - Quora

response.answer_text: Charlie puth advantages : 1.Beatboxer:-He has perfect pitch in his tone. 2.He is best piano player .He did his major in piano.He is the best among all music artists l know. 3.He voice is amazing... 4.His choreography in How long song is quite different from other people . His attitude towards his fans  Shawn mendes :- 1.His determination. We all know he learned playing guitar by watching YouTube videos. 2.I like his guitar playing. 3. His Live concerts are nice and cool. 4. He is a handsome singer... 5. He sings with passion .we can see his voice pitch changes according to beat. Both are very good friends. I like both of them.
